Here we highlight some particularly useful settings, menu items and tools in Dyalog.

Session Toolbelt

These tips work in Dyalog on any supported platform.

üõ† Place the cursor on a symbol or other built-in and press F1 to go straight to the help page for it.

üõ† By default, printing to the session from within a function has ]boxing off.

      {‚éï‚Üê‚ç≥‚çµ}3 3
 1 1  1 2  1 3 
 2 1  2 2  2 3 
 3 1  3 2  3 3 
      ]box -fns=on
Was -fns=off

üõ† Sometimes we generate large output which clutters the session log.

      ]rows -fold=3
was -fold=off
      ‚ç™‚ç≥100

üîß 1 2 3

Dyalog for Microsoft Windows

For historical reasons, the Windows IDE is somewhat more mature and feature-filled than the default environment.

  • Copy/Paste Object
  • Fix function kbd shortcut

RIDE

The Remote Integrated Development Environment is an IDE for Dyalog which runs on Microsoft Windows, macOS and Linux (including Raspberry Pi).
